entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Greater Sudbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:52 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 10:41 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.1°C
Wind: S 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with ice pellets this morning and ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
